com.webfirmframework.wffweb.css

Class BorderBottomColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.webfirmframework.wffweb.css.core.AbstractCssProperty<BorderBottomColor>
      • com.webfirmframework.wffweb.css.BorderBottomColor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CssProperty, StateChangeInformer<Bean>, Serializable, Cloneable

    public class BorderBottomColor
extends AbstractCssProperty<BorderBottomColor>
implements StateChangeInformer<Bean>
     border-bottom-color: color|transparent|initial|inherit;

 The border-bottom-color property sets the color of an element's bottom border.

 Note: Always declare the border-style property before the border-bottom-color property. An element must have borders before you can change the color.
 Default value:  The current color of the element
 Inherited:      no
 Animatable:     yes
 Version:        CSS1
 JavaScript syntax:     object.style.borderBottomColor="blue"
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    WFF
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
